div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, May 12, 1921. THE CESKA DOBROCINNA SPOLECNOST

body.p: As we have reported before, Mr. and Mrs. Roman Sedlacek were successful in securing a number of new members and donators for the Ceska Dobrocinna Spolecnost v Chicagu (Bohemian Charitable Association of Chicago). Recently we received a list of those who contributed or, by donating the sum of five dollars or more, became members of the Association. [List of donors is omitted in translation.]
